pageTitle: Roadside Wildflower Seed Mix -- Hardy Wildflower Mix
textBeforeTable: Customers who bought this product also ordered SuperSeed Perennial Wildflower Seed Roadside Mix Ingredients Contains 22% actual seed and 88% horticultural vermiculite to assist with the even distribution of the seeds when planting. 1 2 3 4 5 6 7 8 9 Roadside Mix Wildflower Seed A Lush Carpet of Spectacular Color! This hardy wildflower mixture is, without a doubt, our most popular. This hardy, all-purpose mix of annuals and perennials will add color and beauty to your flower beds, planter boxes or hill side acreage. Roadside Mix is an all-time favorite of landscape architects and highway engineers across the country. For more years than I can remember, we have provided this hardy wildflower seed mix to the highway and parks departments. This hardy, all-purpose mix of annuals and perennials will cover 750 square feet. Covers up to 750 sq. ft. $9.95 Select Quantity
